plot outline: A renowned actor Chakradar(Balakrishna) is asked to play a character role, a military major named Jaya Simha( also Balakrishna). But the role is not what it seems to be. Who is Major Jaya Simha?. Why is Chakradar asked to play that specific role?.
title: Parama Veera Chakra
plot: A famous actor is asked to play the role of his lookalike army major and eventually battle his enemies.

A renowned actor Chakradar(Balakrishna) is asked to play a character role, a military major named Jaya Simha( also Balakrishna). But the role is not what it seems to be. Who is Major Jaya Simha?. Why is Chakradar asked to play that specific role?.::abhiramreddy48

Fast-paced and fiery, this thrilling tale traces the twists and turns in the life of an actor, who impersonates a national army hero. Will he succeed in capturing the real terrorists who are on the attack, and thereby maintain the integrity of the army and nation?::Shrinivas G. Kulkarni
